item.description:
This hike is on Mother's Day, so please be aware of that.

Trailhead: Take I93 North to Exit 24, at end of ramp turn right to take US3/25E and proceed 0.7 miles, turn left to stay on US3/25E towards Holderness another 3.7 miles, make a left onto NH113 for 5.6 miles, Old Bridal Path parking lot is on the right (opposite parking lot on left side of road for the Mt Morgan Trailhead). We are using the parking lot on the right simply because it is much bigger than the one on the left.

We will hike the Morgan Trail to the summit of Morgan (2,220'),the Crawford-Ridgepole Trail to the summit of Percival (2,212') and the Percival Trail and Morgan-Percival Connector back to the cars. 5.1 miles round trip with an 1,550' elevation gain. There are beautiful views of Squam Lake from both peaks.

With the dogs we won't be able to scale the ladders on Morgan or go down the cliff and through the boulder cave on Percival but there are detours around these places.

We will stop for lunch on Percival.

When you RSVP  please answer the questions asked.  That information will be kept confidential.  If you are concerned about privacy you can email me the answers using my profile email. We are mostly concerned about the emergency information just in case something goes wrong. If you aren't willing to provide the information you will not be allowed on the hike. People not answering the questions will be waitlisted on the hike until you do.

Car Pool Locations:

I-93 N exit 8 Manchester, NH parking lot opposite the fire station on Mammoth Road.  Also next to the Derryfield Restaurant and Golf  Course.  Leaving at 7:45 AM.

I-93 Exit 14 Concord, NH  Fort Eddy Rd back of parking lot in between Hannafords and LL Bean.  Leaving at 8:00 AM

I-93 N exit 2 park and ride, Salem, NH. Leaving at 7:30 AM.

Per club policy, no guests.  Please have your guests join the club.

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Mt. Morgan and Mt. Percival Loop - Moderate Hike
